---
title: "Abstracts"
---

```{r echo = FALSE, results = 'asis'}
library(purrr)
library(glue)
yaml::yaml.load_file("data/abstracts.yaml") |>
  map_chr(\(x) glue_data(x,
                         "{paste(author, collapse = ', ')}",
                         "{title}",
                         "*{event}*",
                         "{location}",
                         "{year}.",
                         .sep = ". ",
                         .na = character())) |>
  cat(sep = "\n\n")
```
